title: Job Openings at Yemsays Properties and Investment Limited
content:
Yemsays Properties and Investment Limited is a leading real estate firm based in Lagos, Nigeria, specializing in property development, investment, and marketing. We are committed to providing top-notch services that connect clients with the best real estate opportunities, ensuring transparency, innovation, and excellence in all our dealings.

At Yemsays, we pride ourselves on our dynamic team, which works tirelessly to deliver exceptional results. We foster a collaborative and professional work environment where every team member’s input is valued and growth is encouraged.
     

            
    



Our services include property sales, real estate investment consultancy, and development projects tailored to meet diverse client needs. As we continue to expand, we are dedicated to empowering our workforce and building a team that shares our vision of transforming lives through real estate.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Videographer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Videographer to capture, edit, and produce high-quality video content that aligns with our brand and marketing objectives.
	The ideal candidate will have strong technical expertise, creativity, and the ability to tell compelling visual stories across multiple platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, shoot, and edit video content for marketing campaigns, social media, events, and corporate communications.
	Collaborate with the content and creative teams to develop concepts, scripts, and storyboards.
	Operate and maintain video equipment, cameras, lighting, and audio gear.
	Ensure all video content is edited and delivered in line with project deadlines and brand guidelines.
	Capture behind-the-scenes, interviews, and promotional footage as required.
	Stay up to date with video trends, editing software, and storytelling techniques.
	Manage video files, archives, and backups for easy retrieval.
	Work with graphic designers, photographers, and other creatives to ensure cohesive production.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree / HND in Film Production, Media Arts, Communications, or a related field (preferred but not mandatory with strong portfolio).
	Proven experience as a videographer or video editor.
	Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects, or DaVinci Resolve).
	Strong knowledge of camera operations, lighting setups, and sound recording.
	A portfolio showcasing creative and technical video work.
	Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects.


Key Skills & Competencies:


	Creativity & Storytelling.
	Technical Expertise in Videography.
	Attention to Detail.
	Teamwork & Collaboration.
	Time Management & Organization.
	Adaptability & Problem-Solving.


Salary
N70,000 - N120,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: emmanueltami7@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Front Desk Representative

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are looking for a personable and organized Front Desk Representative to be the first point of contact for our company.
	The ideal candidate will handle reception duties, manage incoming calls, assist visitors, and provide administrative support to ensure smooth day-to-day operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Welcome and attend to clients, visitors, and guests in a professional manner.
	Manage the reception area and ensure it is tidy, professional, and presentable.
	Answer, screen, and forward phone calls; respond to inquiries via email and in person.
	Maintain visitor records and issue visitor passes where necessary.
	Handle incoming and outgoing correspondence (letters, packages, deliveries).
	Provide administrative support such as filing, photocopying, scheduling, and maintaining office supplies.
	Coordinate with other departments to ensure smooth communication and support.
	Uphold confidentiality and handle sensitive information with discretion.


Qualifications & Requirements


	OND / HND / Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Office Management, or related field.
	1 - 2 years of proven experience as a front desk representative, receptionist, or similar role is an advantage.
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Outlook) and basic office equipment.
	Strong verbal and written communication skills.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Professional appearance and customer service-oriented mindset.


Key Skills & Competencies:


	Communication & Interpersonal Skills
	Customer Service Orientation
	Time Management & Organization
	Attention to Detail
	Problem-Solving
	Professionalism & Confidentiality.


Salary
N70,000 - N80,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: emmanueltami7@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Graphic Designer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are seeking a highly creative and detail-oriented Graphic Designer to produce engaging and on-brand designs for a variety of media.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for bringing ideas to life through visual concepts that inspire, inform, and captivate our audience while maintaining brand consistency across all projects.


Key Responsibilities


	Design and produce a wide variety of marketing materials, including social media graphics, flyers, banners, brochures, and presentations.
	Collaborate with the marketing/content team to develop creative concepts for campaigns.
	Ensure all designs align with brand guidelines and enhance brand identity.
	Edit and manipulate images, graphics, and video content as required.
	Prepare design drafts, present ideas, and incorporate feedback.
	Stay updated on design trends, tools, and technologies to bring fresh ideas to projects.
	Work with external printers, vendors, or agencies when needed to ensure quality and timely delivery of materials.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree or HND in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, Visual Communication, or related field.
	1 - 3 years of proven work experience as a Graphic Designer or similar role.
	Proficiency in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, After Effects), CorelDRAW, or Canva.
	Strong portfolio showcasing design skills across various media.
	Knowledge of typography, color theory, and layout principles.
	Excellent communication, creativity, and attention to detail.
	Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects.


Key Skills & Competencies:


	Creativity & Innovation
	Time Management & Organization
	Attention to Detail
	Team Collaboration
	Problem-Solving
	Adaptability.


Salary
N70,000 - N120,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: emmanueltami7@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Job Openings at PC Place Nigeria
content:
PC Place Nigeria is a leading ICT retail and B2B solutions provider dedicated to delivering top-quality technology products and services across Nigeria. Established with a vision to bridge the gap between people and technology, we specialize in the supply of laptops, desktops, printers, accessories, networking equipment, and enterprise IT solutions to individuals, corporate clients, and institutions nationwide.

With a strong presence in Lagos and a growing footprint across the country, PC Place Nigeria has become a trusted name known for authentic products, competitive pricing, and excellent after-sales support.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

1.) Procurement Officer
     

            
    



Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	PC Place Nigeria is seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Procurement Officer to join our growing team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for sourcing, negotiating, and procuring ICT equipment and services to meet our customer and internal demands, ensuring best value and timely delivery.
	You will work closely with sales, logistics, and vendor teams to streamline our supply chain process.


Key Responsibilities


	Source suppliers/vendors for laptops, tech products, and ICT-related equipment.
	Negotiate pricing, credit terms, and delivery schedules.
	Process purchase requisitions and maintain accurate records of procurement activities.
	Evaluate vendor performance and ensure compliance with quality standards.
	Monitor stock levels and coordinate with the inventory team.
	Prepare and issue Purchase Orders (POs) and ensure timely deliveries.
	Maintain strong relationships with OEMs, wholesalers, and distributors.
	Keep up with market trends and product pricing.
	Assist in maintaining procurement documentation and contracts.
	Work with the finance team on payment follow-ups and supplier account reconciliation.
	Ensure compliance with company procurement policies and procedures.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 2 - 6 years of work experience
	Strong negotiation and analytical skills.
	Solid knowledge of ICT hardware, laptops, accessories, and consumer electronics.
	Familiarity with vendor management and product sourcing.
	Excellent communication and organizational abilities.
	Good knowledge of Microsoft Excel, Word, and basic procurement software.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and  a brief Cover Letter to: pcplacenigeria@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 


2.) Business Development Executive

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking a motivated and results-driven Business Development Executive to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building relationships with potential clients, and driving sales growth.
	The ideal candidate will possess strong communication skills and a keen understanding of market trends, enabling them to effectively promote our services and solutions.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategic Planning: Developing and implementing business development strategies to achieve sales targets and expand market reach.
	Market Research: Analyzing market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify potential opportunities.
	Sales and Business Development: Generating leads, presenting products and services, negotiating contracts, and closing deals.
	Client Relationship Management: Building and maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients, understanding their needs, and providing solutions.
	Collaboration: Working with marketing, product development, and other teams to support business growth and ensure client satisfaction.
	Reporting and Analysis: Preparing sales reports, forecasts, and providing insights to improve business development strategies.


Qualifications


	B.Sc or HND in Business Administration or a related field is desirable.
	Proven experience in business development or sales, preferably within a related industry.
	Demonstrated ability to work independently as well as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
	ICT knowledge is an added advantage.


Skills:


	Sales and Negotiation: Proven ability to sell, negotiate contracts, and close deals.
	Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively present and articulate product value.
	Market Knowledge: Understanding of ICT industry trends, technologies, and competitive landscape.
	Strategic Thinking: Ability to develop and implement effective business development strategies.
	Relationship Management: Strong interpersonal skills to build and maintain client relationships.
	Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.
	Project Management: Ability to manage multiple projects and ensure timely delivery.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a Cover Letter to: pcplacenigeria@gmail.com using "Business Development Executive" as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Programmer

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	PC Place Nigeria is seeking a talented and proactive Programmer to join our team.
	This role is crucial in maintaining and optimizing our e-commerce platform while developing innovative systems and programs that can scale up our business operations.
	If you’re passionate about technology, problem-solving, and building solutions that drive growth, this position is for you.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage, maintain, and enhance the company’s e-commerce website to ensure smooth functionality and excellent user experience.
	Develop, test, and deploy custom applications, software tools, and automation systems to support business processes.
	Collaborate with internal teams to identify pain points and design scalable solutions.
	Implement performance optimization strategies for web applications and back-end systems.
	Integrate third-party tools, APIs, and payment gateways into the website.
	Ensure website security, perform regular backups, and monitor for vulnerabilities.
	Maintain technical documentation and provide support to staff when needed.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
	Proven experience managing and developing e-commerce websites (experience with platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, or custom PHP solutions is an advantage).
	Strong proficiency in programming languages such as PHP, JavaScript, Python, or similar.
	Knowledge of web development technologies (HTML, CSS, React/Vue).
	Experience with database management systems (MySQL, PostgreSQL).
	Familiarity with SEO best practices and site optimization.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to work independently and handle multiple projects.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter, to: pcplacenigeria@gmail.com using "Application for Programmer Position" as the subject of the mail.
